name: EpisodeCalendar Dark
description: A Simple dark style for episodecalendar.com. Never hurt your eyes again just to mark an episode as watched in your calendar. For suggestions, questions or anything else you can contact me at zarnaikstandard@gmail.com.
additional_info: 2015-01-14: Added support for the Unwatched episodes, All shows, search, show overview and My shows pages. Also added in the correct -o, -moz and standard properties where necessary so that not only browsers using the webkit render correctly. 2016-07-17: Fixed some problems after site-changes. I'm short on time so didn't check out all pages. Let me know if you encounter some problems. 2018-06-12: Went through all non-essential pages and fixed them. Everything should be dark now, please report if you find something I missed.
